Class CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration

io.scanbot.sdk.creditcard.CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration
public class CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration extends Object
Configuration for the credit card recognizer

  • Constructor Details

    • CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration

      public CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration(boolean useDocumentDetector, CreditCardRecognitionMode recognitionMode, boolean requireExpiryDate, boolean requireCardholderName, ResultAccumulationConfiguration resultAccumulationConfig)
      Constructs CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration with the given params.
      Parameters:
      useDocumentDetector - If true, the document detector will be used to find where the credit card is in the input image. If false, the recognizer will assume that the credit card has been pre-cropped and takes the entirety of the input image. Default is true
      recognitionMode - The recognition mode Default is LIVE
      requireExpiryDate - Whether the expiry date is required for a successful recognition Default is true
      requireCardholderName - Whether the cardholder name is required for a successful recognition Default is true
      resultAccumulationConfig - Configuration for how to accumulate results

    • CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration

      public CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration()
      Constructs CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration with default parameters. Constructs CreditCardRecognizerConfiguration with the given params.
